name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jeffrey Warren ZIMMERMAN, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jeffrey Warren ZIMMERMAN, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM.
The judgment of sentence is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert T. Burke, Warminster, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Doylestown, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
437 A.2d 1223
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Appellee, v. Jeffrey Warren ZIMMERMAN, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted April 29, 1981.
Decided Dec. 23, 1981.
Robert T. Burke, Warminster, for appellant.
Stephen B. Harris, First Asst. Dist. Atty., Doylestown, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, KAUFFMAN and WILKINSON, JJ.
